KnowledgeBase.Title: isMatrix
KnowledgeBase.ArgumentTypes:
Character String Symbol Vector BitVector ByteVector IntVector
FltVector ObjVector Structure Dictionary Directory
Matrix NumMatrix Integer Float Number Complex Boolean

Function.Description: The isMatrix function returns true if the argument is a Matrix; otherwise, false is returned.

Brief.Overview: The isMatrix function returns true if the argument {obj} is a Matrix or any Matrix subtype such as Bit Matrix, Number Matrix, Float Matrix, etc. , ; otherwise, false is returned.
Brief.Usage: The isMatrix function is used to query an object if it is of type Matrix.

Argument.Name: obj
Argument.AISTypes:
Character, String, Symbol, Vector, BitVector, ByteVector, IntVector,
FltVector, ObjVector, Structure, Dictionary, Directory,
Matrix, NumMatrix, Integer, Float, Number, Complex, Boolean

Syntax.Return: Returns true if the object is a Matrix, otherwise false is returned.
